name: HarvardBridgeShuttles
0:
”Alexa, ask Bridge Shuttles when the next shuttle is”
”Alexa, ask Bridge Shuttles for the next shuttle”
”Alexa, open Bridge Shuttles and how long until the next shuttle”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bridge shuttles
des:
This skill tells you the time until the next shuttle crosses the Harvard Bridge in Cambridge, MA. Right now it only supports the Harvard M2 leaving from the Mass Ave & Beacon St stop, but I will continue to add more shuttles and stops.

Note that to use the Harvard M2 shuttle, you must be a Harvard student.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
